entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow at times this morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 50 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:15 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 07:15 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
